```{r}
vaccine_us <- read_csv("data/vaccine_us.csv")
vaccine_us <- vaccine_us%>%
  clean_names()%>%
  select(state_territory_federal_entity, percent_of_18_pop_with_at_least_one_dose_by_state_of_residence, percent_of_18_pop_fully_vaccinated_by_state_of_residence, total_number_of_pfizer_doses_delivered)


```
